select
,(select s.shop_name from shop s where wo.shop_id=s.shop_id) shop_name ,case when wo.produce_order_id is not null then(select batch_number from produce_order po WHERE po.id=wo.produce_order_id) else null end produceOrderBatchNumber, ifnull((select sum(woss.warehousing_quantity) from warehousing_order_shop_sku woss where woss.warehousing_order_id=wo.id),0) warehousingQuantityTotal from warehousing_order wo
and shop_id =#{shopId} and production_time>= #{productionTimeStart} and production_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{productionTimeEnd}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and batch_number like concat('%',#{batchNumber},'%')
and exists (select 1 from warehousing_order_shop_sku woss where woss.warehousing_order_id=wo.id and woss.shop_sku like concat('%',#{shopSku},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from produce_order po where wo.produce_order_id=po.id and po.batch_number like concat('%',#{produceOrderBatchNumber},'%'))
and status=#{status}
order by wo.create_time desc
